title: Blue Cross NC and Cambia Health Solutions Jointly Terminate Affiliation Agreement
text:
The Boards of Blue Cross NC and Cambia Health Solutions have jointly agreed to end their pursuit of an affiliation by mutually terminating their affiliation contract. The two companies had previously withdrawn the regulatory applications while the affiliation was on hold.

Blue Cross NC and Cambia look forward to ongoing collaboration as licensees of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association and will continue to make strategically aligned investments together as co-owners of Echo Health Ventures.
description: Blue Cross NC and Cambia Health Solutions Jointly Terminate Affiliation Agreement
